v1.0, Jun 05, 2012 -- Initial release.

v1.1, Jun 27, 2012 -- Updated to Redactor 7.7.

v1.2, Jun 28, 2012 -- API changes: ``AdminRedactorEditor`` widget added.

v1.2.1, Jul 25, 2012 -- Updated to Redactor 7.7.2, License change.

v1.2.2, Nov 1, 2012 -- Fixes a bug where adding custom CSS file to the editable area of the editor did not work. Simplifies i18n usage.

v1.2.5, Jan 16, 2014 -- Updates Redactor to 9.1.9

v1.2.6, Apr 24, 2014 -- Python 3 compatibility added, bug with translations fixed.

v1.2.7, June 10, 2014 -- Fixes bug in adding inlines using a redactor widget in the Django admin.
